title: FS Early 1900’s RPPC Lot: Wausau, Polo Grounds Helmar, Red Roses
author: Tripp Trapp

posts.post_title: FS Early 1900’s RPPC Lot: Wausau, Polo Grounds Helmar, Red Roses
posts.post_content:
I have the following postcards for sale. Please email me at [url]jennings.eric@gmail.com[/url] with any questions or for additional photos. Asking $175 for the remaining lot of three. USPS Priority 2-Day shipping included in asking.

1908 Wausau in the Field, Lange Pitching Wausau vs. Rockford -- nice penmanship and written at 12:30am as noted!
1910 Rochester Baseball Club **NO LONGER AVAILABLE**
1914 Polo Grounds with Helmar Advertising
1906 “Red Roses” Base Ball Team

What does the Toledo caption say, please?

Sent from my SM-G986U using Tapatalk

Not the best scans! Apologies! Happy to email you additional photos if you’d like.

“Pitcher Owen delivers the first ball on Swayne Field Toledo, O. 7-3-09”

Thank you!

Sent from my SM-G986U using Tapatalk

nice cards and nice images

Good Luck with them
Bump with addition of “Red Roses”. Thanks!
Bump with new $300 asking price. Thanks!

posts.post_title: Harry Coveleski is on the Red Roses in 1906 I think...
posts.post_content: Stans older brother whom had a cup of coffee in the bigs...
